roleset.name: to proceed despite possible damage or risk
roleset.note: VENTURE-V NOTES: Member of Vncls venture: risk-94. (from venture.01-v)

example.name: gerund
example.text: On further reflection , [she]-1 admits that [*-1]venturing inside the Hammacks ' house the previous day was n't `` such a great idea . ''

roleset.name: to express at a risk of denial
roleset.note: VENTURE-V NOTES: Member of Vncls say-37.7. (from venture.02-v)

example.name: transitive
example.text: Yet I would venture that the landscape of our country alone would justify the use of this lofty adjective ... .
example.arg: the landscape of our country alone would justify the use of this lofty adjective
